metadata.title: CVE-2024-0741 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out of bounds write in ANGLE could have allowed an attacker to corruptmemory leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
